title: Clubs
content: Does being in a club really matter for placements?. Do companies or higher education institutes care if a student has been in a club or not in their college?. I am a student who has decent grades and projects but am not part of any club so Iâ€™m a little worried.

comments.body:
Being in a club teaches you a lot of things which impact your placement interviews. To name a few, technical communication, understanding how code gets written while you're in a team, understanding how to talk and influence people, understanding politics to an extent. These are all essential life skills that you'd find useful not only in an interview, but also in your job. 

Oh, and also it's damn fun
